verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste, <S%H7703><s%> and brought to silence; <S%H1820><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%> Kir <S%H7024><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste, <S%H7703><s%> and brought to silence; <S%H1820><s%>

He is gone up <S%H5927><s%> to Bajith, <S%H1006><s%> and to Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> the high places, <S%H1116><s%> to weep: <S%H1065><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall howl <S%H3213><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> Medeba: <S%H4311><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> their heads <S%H7218><s%> shall be baldness, <S%H7144><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beard <S%H2206><s%> cut off. <S%H1639><s%>

In their streets <S%H2351><s%> they shall gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth: <S%H8242><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the tops of their houses, <S%H1406><s%> and in their streets, <S%H7339><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> shall howl, <S%H3213><s%> weeping <S%H1065><s%> abundantly. <S%H3381><s%>

And Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> shall cry, <S%H2199><s%> and Elealeh: <S%H500><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%> shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Jahaz: <S%H3096><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the armed soldiers <S%H2502><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall cry out; <S%H7321><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%> shall be grievous <S%H3415><s%> unto him.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> shall cry <S%H2199><s%> out for Moab; <S%H4124><s%> his fugitives <S%H1280><s%> shall flee unto <S%H5704><s%> Zoar, <S%H6820><s%> a heifer <S%H5697><s%> of three years old: <S%H7992><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> by the mounting up <S%H4608><s%> of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> with weeping <S%H1065><s%> shall they go it up; <S%H5927><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> they shall raise up <S%H5782><s%> a cry <S%H2201><s%> of destruction. <S%H7667><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> desolate: <S%H4923><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the hay <S%H2682><s%> is withered away, <S%H3001><s%> the grass <S%H1877><s%> faileth, <S%H3615><s%> there is <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> green thing. <S%H3418><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the abundance <S%H3502><s%> they have gotten, <S%H6213><s%> and that which they have laid up, <S%H6486><s%> shall they carry away <S%H5375><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> of the willows. <S%H6155><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the cry <S%H2201><s%> is gone round <S%H5362><s%> about <S%H853><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Moab; <S%H4124><s%> the howling <S%H3213><s%> thereof unto <S%H5704><s%> Eglaim, <S%H97><s%> and the howling <S%H3213><s%> thereof unto Beer-elim. <S%H879><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Dimon <S%H1775><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of blood: <S%H1818><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will bring <S%H7896><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Dimon, <S%H1775><s%> lions <S%H738><s%> upon him that escapeth <S%H6413><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and upon the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the land. <S%H127><s%>
